data.title: Flax Act, 1936 (Suspension) Act, 1947
meta_keywords: Irish Statute Book; irish legislation; Acts; statutory instruments; constitution
data.meta_description: The electronic Irish Statute Book (eISB) comprises the Acts of the Oireachtas (Parliament), Statutory Instruments, Legislation Directory, Constitution and a limited number of pre-1922 Acts.
data.text: 1.â€”The operation of the Flax Act, 1936 (No. 20 of 1936), and of any orders and regulations thereunder in force immediately before the passing of this Act, is hereby suspended until the 1st day of January, 1950, or such earlier day as may be fixed by order of the Government.
